messages.content: How to stay safe when using internet

Use a secure Wi-Fi connection and a password to access sensitive information, such as personal finance information or bank details.
Turn on auto-lock on your device and password protect your browser.
Use a separate account for internet shopping to limit the items that can be purchased.
Use a secure browser such as Chrome or Firefox to protect against malware and suspicious websites.

A vpn (virtual private network) provides an encrypted link to a remote server that lets you access websites as if you were at a nearby location. This can be used to protect your privacy and security when accessing content on the internet.
Are there any downsides of using vpn

Using a vpn comes with a cost. You will usually have to pay for access from a smartphone or other device. It can also affect your internet speed because additional traffic is routed through the vpn server.
